oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A version of the Moon and Hare story (which treats of the Origin of Death), preceded by a prayer, addressed to the young Moon. In the Katkop dialect, by Dia!kwain (L V.-15. 5159-5168 1/2, 16. 5169-5198). A prayer to the new Moon and an account of the origin of death.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A prayer addressed to the Moon, and another version of the Moon and Hare story
